content: IHE IT-Infrastructure has converted three publications to html / IG publisher. These are now out for public comment. See more details https://healthcaresecprivacy.blogspot.com/2022/01/ihe-it-infrastructure-january-public.html

• Mobile Care Services Discovery (mCSD) – Public Comment - Comments due 2022-02-11
  • Mobile Health Document Sharing (MHDS) – Public Comment - Comments due 2022-02-11
  • Document Sharing Metadata Handbook – Public Comment - Comments due 2022-02-11

Public-Comment phase starting today, closing April 1st

  • https://profiles.ihe.net/ITI/mCSD/3.6.1/index.html -- updating mCSD with EndPoint and OrganizationAffiliation
  • https://profiles.ihe.net/ITI/basicaudit/index.html -- Basic Audit
Links to where to put comments might be appreciated
look at the footer of the IGs
Would that be new issue or propose a change?
you can enter github issues in the given github repos... or if you don't have github access, you can use the "Propose a change" web form.
Reminder mCSD enhancements and BasicAudit are still open for public-comment. Comments due at the end of March.
Reminder the mCSD enhancements and BasicAudit profiling are open for public-comment thru Friday.
